thread.title: Live chat: Blue Jays vs. Royals, Game 3
thread.title_full: Live chat: Blue Jays vs. Royals, Game 3

title: Live chat: Blue Jays vs. Royals, Game 3
text:
MLB Playoffs 
Down 2-0 and the bandwagon is suddenly roomy. Sound familiar? Yes the Jays are back in a hole in the post season and looking to climb out of it. 
Join Team Sun tonight about a half hour before fist pitch as we live chat our way through Game 3 of the ALCS. Young and unshakeable Marcus Stroman will try to right the ship for the Jays. 
Mid-season acquisition Johnny Cueto gets the ball for the Royals. 
We will have enough bodies down at the Dome taking things in that you shouldn't miss anything. Join in the conversation around 7:30 p.m.
